In my opinion, the last golden age valve game.  probably one of their most popular multiplayer games ever.
a must have for fps fans in my opinion.
Its a very good game in terms of learning mechanics and grinding, can be frustrating sometimes but that's rare.

I've played for 58 hours (as of this writing) and I've yet to join an actual multiplayer match.  :)  But this is my "calm down" game after a rough day at work.  Log in, pick a map (I love "Vertigo") and kill bots until my blood pressure comes down.

The game play was fine. The only issue and it is a terrible issue is people using hacks. I went up against people using aim bot. Went up against people use wall vision hack. Went up against people where there weapons were more superior.  For this reason it is very unlikable. I would love to see a game where there is no hacks. It would put games more fair. I seen where they have tournaments with this game. That would be so much more fun if you knew there were no hacks involved.
